descriptionNullable:
This dataset is a modified and normalized dataset based on https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/hemantsoni042/celebrity-images-for-face-recognition. The dataset was used for a facial recognition application, namely the DoppelGander application of the OpenCV Academy course. This is a file of 98 people with 30 high-resolution images, suitable for creating a file of about 500 images per person using a simple script using the Pillow library.
 Dlib and OpenFace library models were trained.

Notebook for scale dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/code/radimkzl/scale-up-celebrity-large-dataset?scriptVersionId=182738256
title: Celebrity large dataset
description:
